attributes.action: Allow more Police Forces to introduce Volunteer Police Cadet units.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allow more Police Forces to introduce Volunteer Police Cadet units like the Metropolitan Police Service in London to allow Young People a chance to see what tasks the Police have to deal with and to improve relationships with Police, Young People and the Communitys so they can have an active role in community work also to add more funding to such volunteer groups and units so Police dont have draind Budgets.
